ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to Shuwen Guan, School of Life Science, Jilin University, for his helpful plant identification. This work was financially supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 31870201) and research funding from the Key Laboratory for Evolution of Past Life and Environment in Northeast Asia by the Ministry of Education of China. We thank Jilin Teyi Food Technology Co., Ltd. For providing research funding and plant materials for this research.
